ops_customizations
=========

Ansible role to apply general ops_customizations

Requirements
------------

None

Role Variables
--------------

  opsc_name: name to set in the profile for the prompt bash


Dependencies
------------


Example Playbook
----------------
- role: "ops_roles/ops_customizations"
  opsc_name:  server-name


License
-------

Apache 2.0

Author Information
------------------

Openshift Operations
